name: DASHMANIA2015
description:
This game is done under less that 48 hours for the 7th "Kiss Your Teacher" gamejam by: Jérémy Fornasier, Thomas Preudhomme and Quenin Decharneux.

DASHMANIA2013 is a fast pace 1v1 Tron like gameplay where you have to make your enemy fall in a hole by pushing him off an edge. The falling ground as well as the walls you let behind you will help you accomplish this task.

Thanks for playing DASHMANIA2017 and have fun (not) falling to your death !

PS : Besides the music, all the sound in DASHMANIA2011 were made with our mouth.
